description: Details of cycle parking pursuant to condition 7 of planning permission P/2009/2485 dated 24/09/2009 for the construction of three-storey rear extension, four-storey side extension and installation of one side and one rear dormer window to both no.19 and no.20 and one rooflight to each front roofslope in conjunction with the change of use of no.19 from a House in Multiple Occupation (HMO) to six flats (2 x studios, 2 x 2 bed and 2 x 3 bed) and formation of a studio in the roof of no.20; provision of car and cycle parking and refuse storage to no.19 (Following demolition of single storey side and rear extension to no.19)
decision_conditions: An inadequate number of bicycle parking spaces have been provided in order to provide for the number of flats being proposed. Furthermore, the submitted plan does not indicates that the proposed bicycle parking would be located in secure, undercover, lockable compounds. Given this, the proposal does not demonstrate accordance with the Ealing Sustainable Transport for New Development SPD December 2013 and policies 6.3 and 6.9 of the London Plan 2015.
